Menoua Keshishian PhD Candidate

Linguistic encoding

Analysis of degree of encoding of linguistic information in neural response.

Analyzing how different levels of linguistic content of speech are encoded in the neural representation of the listener's brain, using ridge-regression and feature permutations.

Related publications

Joint, distributed and hierarchically organized encoding of linguistic features in the human auditory cortex. Keshishian, M, Akkol, S, Herrero, J, Bickel, S, Mehta, AD, Mesgarani, N. Nature Human Behaviour (2023)
